property.name: notes
property.value:
Ancient Times



turn order: Greace, Carthage, Egypt, Assyria, Roma, Visigoth, Saxony, Svedic, Yaroslav, Gaul, Mali, Uygher Khaganate


capitals: Athenae, Tunisia, Cairo, Mosul, Roma, Warszawa, Koln, Oslo, Kursk, Burdigala, Al Mahbas, Agartu


land units: ===========================================

unit name att def move cost transport cost ability
wall 0 1 0 1 - **
church 0 1 0 - - 2hit, *
outpost 0 2 0 - - 2hit, *
fortress 0 3 0 - - 2hit, *
castle 0 4 0 - - 2hit, *
citadel 0 5 0 - - 2hit, *

*: one building per territory (i.e. if you build a citadel where a church is, you must edit/delete the church)
**: up to 4 walls per territory. only 1 wall may be built in a territory in a single turn. Multiple walls may be built though per turn.

city 0 0 0 - - can produce
encampment 0 0 0 15 - can produce
general 0 0 1 25 2 can produce
assasin 0 0 1 5 3 anti-hero (is aa)
